UCLA courses in Fall 2018

ucla_f18.Rd

List of all courses at UCLA during Fall 2018.

data("ucla_f18")

Format

A data frame with 3950 observations on the following 14 variables.

year

Year the course was offered.

term

Term the course was offered.

subject

Subject.

subject_abbr

Subject abbreviation, if any.

course

Course name.

course_num

Course number, complete.

course_numeric

Course number, numeric only.

seminar

Boolean for if this is a seminar course.

ind_study

Boolean for if this is some form of independent study.

apprenticeship

Boolean for if this is an apprenticeship.

internship

Boolean for if this is an internship.

honors_contracts

Boolean for if this is an honors contracts course.

laboratory

Boolean for if this is a lab.

special_topic

Boolean for if this is any of the special types of courses listed.

Details

Data was retrieved November 22nd, 2018.

Source

https://sa.ucla.edu/ro/public/soc

Examples

nrow(ucla_f18)
#> [1] 3950
table(ucla_f18$special_topic)
#> 
#> FALSE  TRUE 
#>  2768  1182 
subset(ucla_f18, is.na(course_numeric))
#>      year term           subject subject_abbr                   course
#> 1    2018 Fall Aerospace Studies      AERO ST    Leadership Laboratory
#> 2706 2018 Fall  Military Science      MIL SCI    Leadership Laboratory
#> 2931 2018 Fall     Naval Science      NAV SCI Naval Science Laboratory
#>      course_num course_numeric seminar ind_study apprenticeship internship
#> 1             A             NA   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE
#> 2706          Z             NA   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE
#> 2931          Z             NA   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE
#>      honors_contracts laboratory special_topic
#> 1               FALSE       TRUE          TRUE
#> 2706            FALSE       TRUE          TRUE
#> 2931            FALSE       TRUE          TRUE
table(subset(ucla_f18, !special_topic)$course_numeric < 100)
#> 
#> FALSE  TRUE 
#>  2225   543 
elig_courses <-
    subset(ucla_f18, !special_topic & course_numeric < 100)
set.seed(1)
ucla_textbooks_f18 <-
    elig_courses[sample(nrow(elig_courses), 100), ]
tmp <- order(ucla_textbooks_f18$subject,
    ucla_textbooks_f18$course_numeric)
ucla_textbooks_f18 <- ucla_textbooks_f18[tmp, ]
rownames(ucla_textbooks_f18) <- NULL
head(ucla_textbooks_f18)
#>   year term                 subject subject_abbr
#> 1 2018 Fall American Indian Studies       AM IND
#> 2 2018 Fall            Anthropology       ANTHRO
#> 3 2018 Fall                     Art         <NA>
#> 4 2018 Fall   Arts and Architecture      ART&ARC
#> 5 2018 Fall                   Asian         <NA>
#> 6 2018 Fall               Astronomy         ASTR
#>                                                     course course_num
#> 1                  Introduction to American Indian Studies        M10
#> 2                                Archaeology: Introduction          2
#> 3                                               New Genres        11D
#> 4 Arts Encounters: Exploring Arts Literacy in 21st Century         10
#> 5                                 Introduction to Buddhism       M60W
#> 6                      Black Holes and Cosmic Catastrophes          4
#>   course_numeric seminar ind_study apprenticeship internship honors_contracts
#> 1             10   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE            FALSE
#> 2              2   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE            FALSE
#> 3             11   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE            FALSE
#> 4             10   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE            FALSE
#> 5             60   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE            FALSE
#> 6              4   FALSE     FALSE          FALSE      FALSE            FALSE
#>   laboratory special_topic
#> 1      FALSE         FALSE
#> 2      FALSE         FALSE
#> 3      FALSE         FALSE
#> 4      FALSE         FALSE
#> 5      FALSE         FALSE
#> 6      FALSE         FALSE
